snippet: Abe George, a former assistant district attorney in Manhattan who is running against the Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J. Hynes, aims to stop the broadcast of a six-part series featuring Mr. Hynes’s office.
abstract: Abe George, former assistant district attorney in Manhattan who is running against Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J Hynes, aims to stop broadcast of six-part CBS news television series featuring Hynes’s office; files lawsuit claiming it would give Hynes an unfair edge in primary election.
lead_paragraph: Abe George, a former assistant district attorney in Manhattan who is running against the Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J. Hynes, aims to stop the broadcast of a six-part series featuring Mr. Hynes’s office.

headline.seo: Rival Sues to Block TV Show About Hynes, Brooklyn Prosecutor
headline.main: Suit by a Prosecutor’s Rival Seeks to Block a TV Show
headline.print_headline: Suit by Rival Of Prosecutor Seeks to Block A TV Show
